name: Potion of Healing
description: Restores 2d4+2 HP

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: Restores 4d4+4 HP

name: Potion of Lesser Restoration
description: Cures one disease or condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned).

name: Elixir of Night Vision
description: Grants darkvision out to 60 feet for 8 hours.

name: Potion of Speed
description: Grants the effects of the Haste spell for 1 minute.

name: Potion of Fire Resistance
description: Grants resistance to fire damage for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Growth
description: Grants the effect of the Enlarge/Reduce spell (enlarge only) for 1 minute.

name: Flametongue Draft
description: Weapon attacks deal +1d6 fire damage for 1 min

name: Plague Purge Tonic
description: Cures poisoned condition & grants immunity for 1 hour

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: Grants invisibility for 1 minute or until you attack or cast a spell.

name: Potion of Water Breathing
description: Allows the drinker to breathe underwater for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Spider Climb
description: Grants the ability to walk on walls and ceilings for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Feather Fall
description: Grants the effect of the Feather Fall spell for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Gravemist
description: Gain 10 ft flight for 1 minute

name: Potion of Mind Shielding
description: Grants advantage on saving throws against mind-affecting spells and abilities for 1 hour.

name: Everclear Tonic
description: Clears mind, grants advantage vs charm/fear for 1 hour

name: Potion of Fey Luck
description: Grants the drinker advantage on all saving throws for 1 minute, but has a 5% chance to summon a mischievous fey.

name: Elixir of Undead Warding
description: Grants resistance to necrotic for 1 hour

name: Mystery Brew
description: A random potion effect occurs (roll a d100 for a wild magic effect).

name: Love Draught
description: Inflicts Charm Person on one creature (DC 14) for 1 hour, but there’s a 10% chance the potion backfires and affects the drinker.

name: Potion of Ethereal Drift
description: Become incorporeal for 1 round (disengage/dodge freely)

name: Mana Infusion Flask
description: Recover 1 used spell slot (1st level only)

name: Nightshade Nectar
description: Cast Sleep (DC 13) on target you touch

name: Berserker’s Brew
description: +2 melee dmg for 1 min, but -2 AC

name: Potion of Rage
description: Grants +2 to Strength-based attack and damage rolls but disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws for 1 minute.

name: Fungal Elixir of Foresight
description: +1 to AC and initiative for 10 minutes
